name: Virus Hunt
description:
Virus Hunt is an adventure game where you travel the world, virtually, from east to west, find hidden viruses and kill them.

1. Search a place on the map
2. Zoom in to level 13 or more
3. Locate viruses
4. Tap and kill them, Thanos style !

The search icons will guide you to cities where viruses may be present.

Happy hunting !
